name: AVAssetReaderOutputMetadataAdaptor
desc: An object that creates timed metadata group objects for an asset track.

items.name: init(assetReaderTrackOutput: AVAssetReaderTrackOutput)
items.desc: Creates an object that reads timed metadata groups from an asset reader output.

items.name: func nextTimedMetadataGroup() -> AVTimedMetadataGroup?
items.desc: Returns the next timed metadata group for the asset reader output.

items.name: var assetReaderTrackOutput: AVAssetReaderTrackOutput
items.desc: The asset reader track output that provides the timed metadata groups.
